title: Triple word score [Widescreen]
creator_credit: AFTRS, Jane Keneally and Armagan Ballantyne
brief_description: Sisters Phyllis and Hazel prefer to communicate via the Scrabble board. When a stranger joins their midst, albeit briefly, they are forced to question their circumstances, and the nature of their relationship. Cast includes Iris Shand, Dorothy Cox and Ben Gabriel.
